Sentencas: The fuel processor in which hydrogen is produced from fuels is an important unit in a fuel cell system.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The aim of this study is to apply a thermodynamic concept to identify a suitable reforming process for an ethanol-fueled solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Three different reforming technologies, i.e., steam reforming, partial oxidation and autothermal reforming, are considered.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: The first and second laws of thermodynamics are employed to determine an energy demand and to describe how efficiently the energy is supplied to the reforming process.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Effect of key operating parameters on the distribution of reforming products, such as H-2, CO, CO2 and CH4, and the possibility of carbon formation in different ethanol reformings are examined as a function of steam-to-ethanol ratio, oxygen-to-ethanol ratio and temperatures at atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Energy and exergy analysis are performed to identify the best ethanol reforming process for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analysis of an ethanol reforming process for solid oxide fuel cell applications
